title: Voquel
broadDescription: A full-stack AI platform for audio translation and dubbing

details.point: Full-stack AI translator/dubber preserving rhythm, emotion, and artistic intent across languages.
Efficient GPU-accelerated DSP pipeline optimised for ≤4 GB VRAM consumer GPUs.
Drag-and-drop uploads, YouTube import, real-time progress dashboard, and inline media player for a seamless user experience.
Honorable Mention at the 2025 Synopsys Science Fair (top 10% out of ~1000 competitors); 30+ hours of Voquel-translated content watched on YouTube.

title: Tessera
broadDescription: A Lightweight LLM-driven auditory rehabilitation agent

details.point: End-to-end conversational voice agent designed for auditory rehabilitation through adaptive listening exercises.
Session state managed entirely by an LLM session, enabling personalised progression in a lightweight (<30 MB) app ready for clinical use.

title: PercGAN
broadDescription: A lightweight machine learning approach for high-fidelity stereo audio sample generation

details.point: Developed a generative adversarial network addressing critical research gaps in lightweight high-quality stereo audio synthesis.
Implemented image-like audio representations and efficient model training techniques.
Achieved an 85% quality improvement and a 25× training-time reduction compared with industry benchmarks.
Designed computational models for drone-based fungal infection treatment system, created prototype 3D printed components.
Presented the project to a civil and aerospace engineering panel; won first place out of 260 competitors at the 2024 FlexFactor Entrepreneurship Championships.
Designed and implemented a scalable data collection and visualization platform for FRC competition analysis.
Developed intuitive interfaces driven by user feedback, enabling team members to easily capture comprehensive match data in real-time.
Trained and mentored 10+ team members in application development and user interface design.
Implemented advanced analytics features enabling data-driven strategic decisions and alliance selections.

title: Domotron
broadDescription: FRC604's Robot for the 2024 FRC Game "Crescendo"

details.point: Implemented computer vision and physics-based shot calculation systems for precise game piece targeting.
Developed driver control automation and competitive autonomous routines for optimal match performance.
Designed and implemented chain climbing mechanism critical to end-game scoring strategy.
Directly contributed to robot winning Milstein World Championship division, 3 California regional events, and 5 additional awards.

title: VelocityDraft
broadDescription: A flexible essay writing scheduler webapp

details.point: Created algorithm-driven web application to optimize college application essay writing schedules based on deadlines and user capabilities.
Implemented stress-reduction features to balance workload and improve student productivity.
Application won third place in OneHacks III International Hackathon out of 120 competing teams and currently serves 200+ users.
